body_html:
Root cause of 1 and 2 was that the old TH binding code used to do some extra checks, which native functions don't do. Added those tests back manually.

3 is a bit weirder; I'm not sure how the old code managed to report an error. In any case, adding the shape tests at the appropriate places was easy. PR coming.

body:
Root cause of 1 and 2 was that the old TH binding code used to do some extra checks, which native functions don't do. Added those tests back manually.

3 is a bit weirder; I'm not sure how the old code managed to report an error. In any case, adding the shape tests at the appropriate places was easy. PR coming.
